item.title: Essential Tremor and low Vitamin D
item.description:
Suggestions as to what to try for ET as of Nov 2023

  1. High-dose vitamin D to get past likely poor Vitamin D Receptor genes

    • Take at least 300,000 IU within a week and see if the ET greatly decreases

    • Topical Vitamin D would be the best form,

    •     as it bypasses the liver, kidney and any Vitamin D Binding protein problem

  2. B vitamins, especially B12, might also help

  3. Activators of the Vitamin D Receptor might also help
